children.text: At the start of the layout, we add all items into the Inventory layer

events.title: INVENTORY DISPLAY
events.description: Status of Inventory - updates continuously while Inventory is open

children.text:
✪ All basic interactions with inventories and items can be performed only if the layer of the same name is Visible.
Thus, by simply hiding the layer, the ability to perform any actions with Items is disabled

children.functionDescription: assign data to inventory item slots

children.text: New way of setting all items in the main collection - after this works, see about using for equip too
SET SLOTITEMS BASED ON DICTIONARY VALUES
Single Click on an Item in World or Inventory - Set the variables of the Active Item and highlight this Active Item
If in world (not inventory) pick the showcase item
If in Inventory - pick the item slot and set currentitemslot and inv section (StartInvWindow)
"CANCEL" Button - Item Usage
"DROP" Button - Item Usage
The "DROP" button - deletes the Active Item and clears the array cell (or reduces Qty by 1 for stackable items)

children.functionDescription: When in inventory screen, delete an item from player collection

actions.text: not sure if we just need to say "main" for category here

children.text: If on the map (and in Shop mode) offer to Sell the item
NOTE: reinstate SpFont_Stack once we've solved the stack number issue
"USE" Button - Item Usage
Btn_Select to move forward - like equip, remove or take an item

children.functionDescription: Equip, consume, or remove item in Collection

children.text: If on the map (and in Shop mode) offer to Buy the item
If on the map (not in Inventory yet) TAKE the item into inventory
If Item is > 110 and < 121 then add the "strength" directly to the Gems count
If in Main Collection, and it's of the right category to equip - then equip the item
If Equipped, then move to main Collection
If Food, then eat to make up for the Hunger variable
Equipment Change Function ...

events.title: HERO STATE
events.description: Setting the values of your Hero's variables

children.text: Your hero's statistics function. When calling a function, you must specify what needs to be done in its parameter - NEED TO REWRITE TO USE NEW ITEM STRUCTURE
Resetting Attack, Speed and Defense variables
Write "0" to text blocks

actions.text: Show corresponding variable values in text blocks

events.title: HINT & DESCRIPTION
events.description: Hint and Description of Items with characteristics. Appears when tapping an Item in World or Inventory

children.text:
Function of calling Hints and Descriptions
We select the UID of the item passed through the function parameter.

If the Item is NOT Stackable - We display information about the Item in the text through the data from the Description array. Separate different parts of the string with a tokenat.
Set the size of the Hint window approximately equal to the size of the displayed text
Set the position for the Hints window. So that the window does not appear outside the screen. We select the best option
Set value for strength (if strength exists)

The Arrow displays information which Item is better. The one that is equipped, or the one that is in the inventory.
To do this, compare the values of the above ▲ Items and set the corresponding animation to the Arrow
Set the position for the action buttons and label appropriately.
Create Buy UI
The function of hiding the Hint and its additional elements
Visual design when Stacking the same Items. A short increase in the scale of the SpriteFont via the "Tween" plugin
When the Scale is over, disable plugin for the optimization
